description.description: A description of the suggested search.

documents_in_last_year.description: The number of documents found in the last year for this search.

position.description: The display position of the suggested search.

search_conditions.description: The conditions used for this suggested search.

section.description: The section this suggested search belongs to.

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug for the suggested search.

title.description: The title of the suggested search.
